Txt.japanese: Wrong password

Txt.english: Account name doesn't exist.
Txt.japanese: Account name doesn't exist.

Txt.english: The server is under maintenance, Please login into the game later. Sorry for any inconvenience caused.
Txt.chinese: The server is under maintenance, Please login into the game later. Sorry for any inconvenience caused.
Txt.japanese: The server is under maintenance, Please login into the game later. Sorry for any inconvenience caused.

Txt.english: Passwords do not match.
Txt.japanese: Passwords do not match.

Txt.english: Username has been existed.
Txt.japanese: Username has been existed.

Txt.english: Please enter your email address.
Txt.japanese: Please enter your email address.

Txt.english: To protect your account, please input password at least 6 characters.
Txt.chinese: To protect your account, please input password at least 6 characters.
Txt.japanese: To protect your account, please input password at least 6 characters.

Txt.english: Do you want to transfer your previous game data to your new account?
Txt.chinese: Do you want to transfer your previous game data to your new account?
Txt.japanese: Do you want to transfer your previous game data to your new account?

Txt.english: Are you sure to quit? (Cost will not be refunded after quitting)
Txt.chinese: Are you sure to quit? (Cost will not be refunded after quitting)
Txt.japanese: Are you sure to quit? (Cost will not be refunded after quitting)

Txt.english: empty password!
Txt.japanese: empty password!

Txt.english: Your account is not existed or wrong password,please try again!
Txt.chinese: 您的帐号不存在或者密码输入有误，请查证后再次尝试登录！
Txt.japanese: Your account is existed or wrong password,please try again!

Txt.english: Your account is unavaild,please contact service center!
Txt.chinese: 您的帐号暂时处于冻结状态，请联系客户服务中心了解详细情况！
Txt.japanese: Your account is unavaild,please contact service center!

Txt.english: System paused!
Txt.japanese: System paused!

Txt.english: Your IP is prohibited,please contact service center!
Txt.chinese: 抱歉地通知您，系统禁止了您所在的 IP 地址的登录功能，请联系客户服务中心了解详细情况！
Txt.japanese: Your IP is prohibited,please contact service center!

Txt.english: Your login function is prohibited,please contact service center!
Txt.chinese: 抱歉地通知您，系统禁止了您的机器的登录功能，请联系客户服务中心了解详细情况！
Txt.japanese: Your login function is prohibited,please contact service center!

Txt.english: Game dll is not existed!
Txt.chinese: 系统游戏动态库不存在！
Txt.japanese: Game dll is not existed!

Txt.english: Register paused!
Txt.japanese: Register paused!

Txt.english: Login paused!
Txt.japanese: Login paused!

Txt.english: Your account contains unvalid character,please try again!
Txt.chinese: 抱歉地通知您，您所输入的登录账号名含有限制字符串，请更换账号名后再次申请账号！
Txt.japanese: Your account contains unvalid character,please try again!

Txt.english: Your nickname contains unvalid character,please try again!
Txt.chinese: 抱歉地通知您，您所输入的游戏昵称名含有限制字符串，请更换昵称名后再次申请帐号！
Txt.japanese: Your nickname contains unvalid character,please try again!

Txt.english: Your IP register function is prohibited,please contact service center!
Txt.chinese: 抱歉地通知您，系统禁止了您所在的 IP 地址的注册功能，请联系客户服务中心了解详细情况！
Txt.japanese: Your register function is prohibited,please contact service center!

Txt.english: Your register machine function is prohibited, please contact service center!
Txt.chinese: 抱歉地通知您，系统禁止了您的机器的注册功能，请联系客户服务中心了解详细情况！
Txt.japanese: Your register function is prohibited,please contact service center!

Txt.english: This account has already been taken.
Txt.chinese: 此帐号已被注册，请换另一帐号尝试再次注册！
Txt.japanese: Your account has existed,please try another again!

Txt.english: Your nickname has existed,please try another again!
Txt.chinese: 此昵称已被注册，请换另一昵称尝试再次注册！
Txt.japanese: Your nickname has existed,please try another again!

Txt.english: Register account failed,please try again!
Txt.chinese: 由于意外的原因，帐号注册失败，请尝试再次注册！
Txt.japanese: Register account failed,please try again!

Txt.english: Guest user is not existed, you would not update!
Txt.chinese: 此机器的Guest用户不存在，无法完成升级！
Txt.japanese: Guest user is not existed, you would not update!

Txt.english: Your game coins is exception, please contact service center!
Txt.chinese: 抱歉地通知你，您的游戏币数据出现了异常情况，请联系客户服务中心了解详细情况！
Txt.japanese: Your game coins is exception, please contact service center!

Txt.english: You can't play game in same room at the same time!
Txt.chinese: 您正在游戏房间中，不能同时在进入此游戏房间！
Txt.japanese: You can't play game in same room at the same time!

Txt.english: Your game coins is locked,please contact service center!
Txt.chinese: 抱歉地通知你，游戏币锁定操作失败，请联系客户服务中心了解详细情况！
Txt.japanese: Your game coins is locked,please contact service center!
